mapper.sql: id, book_category_id, title, cover_path, delivery_method_id, press, author, edition, selling_price, rental_price
mapper.select: SELECT distinct(bb.id), bb.book_category_id, bb.title, bb.cover_path, bb.delivery_method_id, bb.press, bb.author, bb.edition, bb.selling_price, bb.rental_price FROM bk_book bb JOIN bk_dealed_book bdb ON bb.id=bdb.book_id WHERE bdb.selled=0 AND bdb.rented=0;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bk_book (book_category_id, title, cover_path, delivery_method_id, press, author, edition, selling_price, rental_price) VALUES (#{bookCategoryId},#{title},#{coverPath}, #{deliveryMethodId},#{press},#{author}, #{edition},#{sellingPrice},#{rentalPrice})
mapper.update: UPDATE bk_book SET book_category_id=#{bookCategoryId}, title=#{title}, cover_path=#{coverPath}, delivery_method_id=#{deliveryMethodId}, press=#{press}, author=#{author}, edition=#{edition}, selling_price=#{sellingPrice}, rental_price=#{sellingPrice} WHERE id=#{id}
